10.ara-name: كتاب الجنائز عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Al-Qasim bin Muhammad narrated from Aishah:"The Prophet kissed Uthman bin Maz'un when he died, and he was crying." Or, he (one of the narrators) said: "His eyes were brimming with tears

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي تَقْبِيلِ الْمَيِّتِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Kissing The Dead
